AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: made arguments regarding the Speedy Trial Act and the exclusion of delay periods related to his continuance motions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: granted continuances and entered ends-of-justice findings, which were used to determine the exclusion of delay periods under the Speedy Trial Act
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: governs the timing of trials and requires the United States District Court to enter ends-of-justice findings to support continuances
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant whose case was affected by the United States District Court's granting of continuances and entry of ends-of-justice findings
